name: Synthetic Love
description:
Biochemist Victor is the soon-to-be-famed inventor of the pleasure-enhancing serum that’s going to change the world forever. He’s traveled to his private residence found high in the mountains and away from prying eyes so he can finish his serum in solitude -- though, he’s not exactly alone.

Three lovely female companions accompany Victor to make sure his workspaces stay tidy and that he’s not disturbed while he works. But most importantly, they can help him realize just how much pleasure his serum can provide. That is, as soon as he can figure out why the serum causes complete memory loss during the most pleasurable times. Help Victor overcome these losses in memory so that you too can experience each and every sensual encounter he has with his sexy female companions.Key Game Features
  • 3 different endings
  • 15+ Explorable Locations
  • 3 Unique Girls
  • Deep Reaching Exploration & Choice System
  • Visual Novel Style Interactions
